name: The Root of the Problem (Robin)
description:
What's that noise? 

An anonymous call complaining about a noise has come through. Talk to the colourful residents to figure out the cause and stop the noise.

A short visual novel "who dunnit" without the murder.

Made  in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023 

Credits:
Robin Griffiths - Narrative, Code, Art
Kayleigh Macleod - Character Art
